WorkItem.ClosedComment: Tier 10 4-piece bonus implemented in r47309.And yes, the bonus sucks.
WorkItem.Description:
As of 2.3.8 Rawr's set bonuses from Buffs.cs seem to include only retribution set bonus.
http://www.wowhead.com/?itemset=899 
 
* 2 pieces: While your Divine Illumination talent is active, your healing spells are 35% stronger. http://www.wowhead.com/?spell=70755
* 4 pieces: Your Holy Shock spell causes the next Holy Light you cast within 10 sec to have 0.3 sec reduced cast time.  http://www.wowhead.com/?spell=70756
 
seem to be missing.
I'm sure this will change soon, but i wanted to push it a little.
 
On related off topic note, how is the t9 set bonus called on the buf fpage? i cant find a triumphant 2/4 piece of Triumphant Garb

Comments.Message: Occurs still with 2.3.9 , could someone at least say, we dont have time to do it right now? ;)

Well, our 2 piece T10 bonus is actually a technical thing allowing us to do one more Divine Plea with not so big healing reduction. And our 4 piece T10 bonus suck for Holy Light play style. (And Rawr currently doesn't support Flash of Light play style.) So it's not a major problem I think. Maybe I'll have a look at it after I'm finished with Retribution...
Orlangur, if we have t10 pieces available but nonsetpieces have better stats use those because the setbonus is crap for hl healing style?

Well, I think you should take 2 piece bonus if you sometimes use Divine Plea with no healing increasing ability on hard fights. That will help keeping tanks alive. I don't think you should take 4 piece T10 if you tend to spam Holy Light unless other stats on it are better.

Tier 10 2-piece implemented in r47274.  Rawr really likes this set bonus because the model will only ever cast Holy Light while Divine Illumination is active.

I may not have time to do 4T10 today, but I will get to it this week.
